verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and keep <WH8104> his charge <WH4931>, and his statutes <WH2708>, and his judgments <WH4941>, and his commandments <WH4687>, alway <WH3117>.

And know <WH3045> ye this day <WH3117>: for I speak not with your children <WH1121> which have not known <WH3045>, and which have not seen <WH7200> the chastisement <WH4148> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, his greatness <WH1433>, his mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and his stretched out <WH5186> arm <WH2220>,

And his miracles <WH226>, and his acts <WH4639>, which he did <WH6213> in the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and unto all his land <WH776>;

And what he did <WH6213> unto the army <WH2428> of Egypt <WH4714>, unto their horses <WH5483>, and to their chariots <WH7393>; how he made the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> to overflow <WH6687> them <WH6440> as they pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> you, and how the LORD <WH3068> hath destroyed <WH6> them unto this day <WH3117>;
And what he did <WH6213> unto you in the wilderness <WH4057>, until ye came <WH935> into this place <WH4725>;

And what he did <WH6213> unto Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48>, the sons <WH1121> of Eliab <WH446>, the son <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>: how the earth <WH776> opened <WH6475> her mouth <WH6310>, and swallowed them up <WH1104>, and their households <WH1004>, and their tents <WH168>, and all the substance <WH3351> that was in their possession <WH7272>, in the midst <WH7130> of all Israel <WH3478>: substance: or, living substance which followed them was: Heb. was at their feet
But your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all the great <WH1419> acts <WH4639> of the LORD <WH3068> which he did <WH6213>.

Therefore shall ye keep <WH8104> all the commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, that ye may be strong <WH2388>, and go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it;

And that ye may prolong <WH748> your days <WH3117> in the land <WH127>, which the LORD <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> unto them and to their seed <WH2233>, a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

For the land <WH776>, whither thou goest in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, is not as the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from whence ye came out <WH3318>, where thou sowedst <WH2232> thy seed <WH2233>, and wateredst <WH8248> it with thy foot <WH7272>, as a garden <WH1588> of herbs <WH3419>:

But the land <WH776>, whither ye go <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it, is a land <WH776> of hills <WH2022> and valleys <WH1237>, and drinketh <WH8354> water <WH4325> of the rain <WH4306> of heaven <WH8064>:

A land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> careth for <WH1875>: the eyes <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> are always <WH8548> upon it, from the beginning <WH7225> of the year <WH8141> even unto the end <WH319> of the year <WH8141>. careth: Heb. seeketh

And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken <WH8085> diligently <WH8085> unto my commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, to love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and to serve <WH5647> him with all your heart <WH3824> and with all your soul <WH5315>,

That I will give <WH5414> you the rain <WH4306> of your land <WH776> in his due season <WH6256>, the first rain <WH3138> and the latter rain <WH4456>, that thou mayest gather <WH622> in thy corn <WH1715>, and thy wine <WH8492>, and thine oil <WH3323>.
And I will send <WH5414> grass <WH6212> in thy fields <WH7704> for thy cattle <WH929>, that thou mayest eat <WH398> and be full <WH7646>. send: Heb. give
Take heed <WH8104> to yourselves, that your heart <WH3824> be not deceived <WH6601>, and ye turn aside <WH5493>, and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> them;

And then the LORD'S <WH3068> wrath <WH639> be kindled <WH2734> against you, and he shut up <WH6113> the heaven <WH8064>, that there be no rain <WH4306>, and that the land <WH127> yield <WH5414> not her fruit <WH2981>; and lest ye perish <WH6> quickly <WH4120> from off the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> giveth <WH5414> you.

Therefore shall ye lay up <WH7760> these my words <WH1697> in your heart <WH3824> and in your soul <WH5315>, and bind <WH7194> them for a sign <WH226> upon your hand <WH3027>, that they may be as frontlets <WH2903> between your eyes <WH5869>.

And ye shall teach <WH3925> them your children <WH1121>, speaking <WH1696> of them when thou sittest <WH3427> in thine house <WH1004>, and when thou walkest <WH3212> by the way <WH1870>, when thou liest <WH7901> down, and when thou risest up <WH6965>.
And thou shalt write <WH3789> them upon the door posts <WH4201> of thine house <WH1004>, and upon thy gates <WH8179>:

That your days <WH3117> may be multiplied <WH7235>, and the days <WH3117> of your children <WH1121>, in the land <WH127> which the LORD <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto your fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> them, as the days <WH3117> of heaven <WH8064> upon the earth <WH776>.

For if ye shall diligently <WH8104> keep <WH8104> all these commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> you, to do <WH6213> them, to love <WH157> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in all his ways <WH1870>, and to cleave <WH1692> unto him;

Then will the LORD <WH3068> drive out <WH3423> all these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you, and ye shall possess <WH3423> greater <WH1419> nations <WH1471> and mightier <WH6099> than yourselves.

Every place <WH4725> whereon the soles <WH3709> of your feet <WH7272> shall tread <WH1869> shall be yours: from the wilderness <WH4057> and Lebanon <WH3844>, from the river <WH5104>, the river <WH5104> Euphrates <WH6578>, even unto the uttermost <WH314> sea <WH3220> shall your coast <WH1366> be.

There shall no man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you: for the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall lay <WH5414> the fear <WH6343> of you and the dread <WH4172> of you upon <WH6440> all the land <WH776> that ye shall tread <WH1869> upon, as he hath said <WH1696> unto you.
Behold <WH7200>, I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117> a blessing <WH1293> and a curse <WH7045>;
A blessing <WH1293>, if ye obey <WH8085> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>:

And a curse <WH7045>, if ye will not obey <WH8085> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, but turn aside <WH5493> out of the way <WH1870> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, to go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, which ye have not known <WH3045>.

And it shall come to pass, when the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath brought thee in <WH935> unto the land <WH776> whither thou goest <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, that thou shalt put <WH5414> the blessing <WH1293> upon mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630>, and the curse <WH7045> upon mount <WH2022> Ebal <WH5858>.

Are they not on the other side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383>, by <WH310> the way <WH1870> where the sun <WH8121> goeth down <WH3996>, in the land <WH776> of the Canaanites <WH3669>, which dwell <WH3427> in the champaign <WH6160> over against <WH4136> Gilgal <WH1537>, beside <WH681> the plains <WH436> of Moreh <WH4176>?

For ye shall pass over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> to go in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> you, and ye shall possess <WH3423> it, and dwell <WH3427> therein.
And ye shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> which I set <WH5414> before <WH6440> you this day <WH3117>.
